text: crossing the Sahara in search of a
better life these migrants are bound for

begins in the desert of leisure

may not survive the extreme heat when

here have left countries with few jobs

his goal was the last word I most make

migration is big business in the Sahara
there will be officials and soldiers to

we charge different prices depending on
where they come from he says but on

there will be hundreds more tonight's
now borders are being tightened in

this is good the food is good you go

percent
but for each migrants giving up on
